message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $130 to start.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to pay that price for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $120?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay that price for it.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here. $110 is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product.
